1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Message
6  ( -- * Abortable
7    abOption,
8    abRelmap,
9    abSpecialize,
10    -- * Message
11    unkNestVar,
12    disabledInputClause,
13    disabledOutputClause,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture      as O
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base          as B
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax        as S
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type          as T
20
21-- | Abortable scope for option.
22abOption :: (B.GetCodePos cp) => B.Abortable cp b
23abOption = B.abortable "option"
24
25-- | Abortable scope for relmap.
26abRelmap :: (B.GetCodePos cp) => B.Abortable cp b
27abRelmap = B.abortable "relmap"
28
29-- | Abortable scope for specialization.
30abSpecialize :: (B.GetCodePos cp) => B.Abortable cp b
31abSpecialize = B.abortable "specialize"
32
33-- | Unknown nested relation reference.
34unkNestVar :: String -> [S.Token] -> [((S.Token, S.LocalRef), T.Head)] -> B.Ab a
35unkNestVar n ls ds = left where
36    left = B.leftLines "Unknown nested relation reference"
37           $ ("search" : map indent dynamic)
38          ++ ("for"    : map indent lexical)
39    indent  = ("  " ++)
40    lexical = map (text $ S.LocalSymbol n) ls
41    dynamic = map f ds
42    f ((tk, k), _) = text k tk
43    text (S.LocalSymbol k) tk = unwords ["nested relation", quote k, "in", tokenAtPoint tk]
44    text (S.LocalNest   k) tk = unwords ["nested relation", S.termNameString k, "in", tokenAtPoint tk]
45
46quote :: O.StringMap
47quote s = "'" ++ s ++ "'"
48
49tokenAtPoint :: S.Token -> String
50tokenAtPoint tok = unwords ws where
51    ws    = [S.tokenContent tok, "at L" ++ line, "C" ++ col]
52    cp    = B.getCP tok
53    line  = show $ B.cpLineNo   cp
54    col   = show $ B.cpColumnNo cp
55
56-- | Disabled feature: input clause
57disabledInputClause :: B.Ab b
58disabledInputClause = disabledFeature "input clause"
59
60-- | Disabled feature: output clause
61disabledOutputClause :: B.Ab b
62disabledOutputClause = disabledFeature "output clause"
63
64disabledFeature :: String -> B.Ab b
65disabledFeature = B.leftLine "Disabled feature"
66
